00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Text;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00035     public static class Cmd {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Events
00038         // ============================================
00039 
00040         // ============================================
00041         // PUBLIC Methods
00042         // ============================================
00044         public static void Login (PeerSocket peer, UserInfo userInfo) {
00045             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00046             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "login";
00047             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("name", userInfo.Name);
00048             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("secure", userInfo.SecureAuthentication.ToString());
00049 
00050             string magic = Protocol.Login.GenerateMagic(peer);
00051             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("magic", magic);
00052 
00053             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00054         }
00055 
00057         public static void Error (PeerSocket peer, string message) {
00058             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00059             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "error";
00060             xmlRequest.BodyText = message;
00061             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00062         }
00063 
00065         public static void Error (PeerSocket peer, string f, params object[] objs) {
00066             StringBuilder message = new StringBuilder();
00067             message.AppendFormat(f, objs);
00068             Error(peer, message.ToString());
00069         }
00070 
00072         public static void RequestFolder (PeerSocket peer, string path) {
00073             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00074             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "get";
00075             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file-list");
00076             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("path", path);
00077             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00078         }
00079 
00081         public static void RequestFile (PeerSocket peer, string path) {
00082             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00083             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "get";
00084             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00085             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("path", path);
00086             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00087         }
00088 
00090         public static void RequestFile (PeerSocket peer, ulong id) {
00091             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00092             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "get";
00093             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file-id");
00094             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", id);
00095             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00096         }
00097 
00099         public static void SendFileList (PeerSocket peer, string path) {
00100             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00101             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd";
00102             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file-list");
00103             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("path", path);
00104             xmlRequest.BodyText = FolderFileList(path);
00105             peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00106         }
00107 
00108         // ============================================
00109         // PRIVATE Methods
00110         // ============================================
00112         private static string FolderFileList (string path) {
00113             string mySharedPath = Paths.UserSharedDirectory(MyInfo.Name);
00114 
00115             path = Path.Combine(mySharedPath, path.Substring(1));
00116             // Now Go Through The Directory and Extract All The File Information
00117             if (Directory.Exists(path) == false)
00118                 return(null);
00119 
00120             // Get Root Directory
00121             DirectoryInfo root = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00122             string folder = "";     // Path|is_dir(0|1)\n
00123 
00124             // Get SubDirectory
00125             foreach (DirectoryInfo d in root.GetDirectories()) {
00126                 if (!d.Name.StartsWith("."))
00127                     folder += d.FullName.Substring(mySharedPath.Length) + "|1\n";
00128             }
00129 
00130             // Get Files
00131             foreach (System.IO.FileInfo f in root.GetFiles()) {
00132                 if (!f.Name.StartsWith("."))
00133                     folder += f.FullName.Substring(mySharedPath.Length) + "|0\n";
00134             }
00135 
00136             return(folder);
00137         }
00138     }
00139 }
